baton-rouge.neighborhoods: Downtown, Garden District, LSU area, Perkins Road corridor, Mid City, Southdowns
baton-rouge.meetingHighlights: Capital city recovery with strong LSU campus presence; diverse meetings from downtown to suburbs; active young people's community.
baton-rouge.transitInfo: CATS bus service; Baton Rouge Metropolitan Airport (BTR); Mississippi River location.

new-orleans.neighborhoods: French Quarter, Garden District, Bywater, Mid-City, Uptown, Lower Garden District
new-orleans.meetingHighlights: Historic recovery community with meetings across all neighborhoods; strong Mardi Gras sobriety traditions; 24-hour meeting culture.
new-orleans.transitInfo: RTA Streetcar and bus service; Louis Armstrong New Orleans International Airport (MSY).

shreveport.neighborhoods: Downtown Shreveport, Highland, Southern Hills, Youree Drive area
shreveport.meetingHighlights: Twin-city recovery serving Shreveport-Bossier; active meetings throughout Red River area; strong service community.
shreveport.transitInfo: SporTran bus service; Shreveport Regional Airport (SHV); I-20 corridor.

lafayette.neighborhoods: Downtown Lafayette, Oil Center, River Ranch, Northgate, Ambassador Caffery corridor
lafayette.meetingHighlights: Cajun Country recovery with bilingual French/English meetings; strong Acadiana traditions; welcoming community atmosphere.
lafayette.transitInfo: LTS bus service; Lafayette Regional Airport (LFT); heart of Acadiana.
